org.apache.hivemind.definition.impl
Class ModuleDefinitionHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.definition.impl.ModuleDefinitionHelper

public class ModuleDefinitionHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class that offers convenience functions for the definition of modules and its extension points. All instances created are standard implementations of the definition interfaces.

Author:
Achim Huegen
